title: PyTorch installation does downgrade the python3.7.0 to python3.6.6
body_html:
pytorch installation does downgrade the python3.7 to python3.6 when using conda installation.

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda install pytorch torchvision cuda92 -c pytorch
  • OS: ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.4.1
  • Python version: 3.7
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2
  • GPU models and configuration: Titan XP

#Original env:
Python 3.7.0 (default, Jun 28 2018, 13:15:42)
[GCC 7.2.0] :: Anaconda, Inc. on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

#Installation of pytorch:
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda92 -c pytorch
Solving environment: done

Package Plan

environment location: /home/sb0709/anaconda3/envs/pytorch_test

added / updated specs:
- cuda92
- pytorch
- torchvision

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

blas:           1.0-mkl                                    
cffi:           1.11.5-py36h9745a5d_0                      
cuda92:         1.0-0                               pytorch
freetype:       2.9.1-h8a8886c_0                           
intel-openmp:   2018.0.3-0                                 
jpeg:           9b-h024ee3a_2                              
libgfortran-ng: 7.2.0-hdf63c60_3                           
libpng:         1.6.34-hb9fc6fc_0                          
libtiff:        4.0.9-he85c1e1_1                           
mkl:            2018.0.3-1                                 
mkl_fft:        1.0.4-py36h4414c95_1                       
mkl_random:     1.0.1-py36h4414c95_1                       
ninja:          1.8.2-py36h6bb024c_1                       
numpy:          1.15.0-py36h1b885b7_0                      
numpy-base:     1.15.0-py36h3dfced4_0                      
olefile:        0.45.1-py36_0                              
pillow:         5.2.0-py36heded4f4_0                       
pycparser:      2.18-py36_1                                
pytorch:        0.4.1-py36_cuda9.2.148_cudnn7.1.4_1 pytorch [cuda92]
six:            1.11.0-py36_1                              
torchvision:    0.2.1-py36_1                        pytorch

The following packages will be UPDATED:

certifi:        2018.4.16-py37_0                            --> 2018.4.16-py36_0
pip:            10.0.1-py37_0                               --> 10.0.1-py36_0   
setuptools:     39.2.0-py37_0                               --> 39.2.0-py36_0   
wheel:          0.31.1-py37_0                               --> 0.31.1-py36_0

The following packages will be DOWNGRADED:

python:         3.7.0-hc3d631a_0                            --> 3.6.6-hc3d631a_0

Proceed ([y]/n)?

#output after installation:
python
Python 3.6.6 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Jun 28 2018, 17:14:51)
[GCC 7.2.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

body:
pytorch installation does downgrade the python3.7 to python3.6 when using conda installation. 

- PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda install pytorch torchvision cuda92 -c pytorch
- OS: ubuntu 16.04
- PyTorch version: 0.4.1
- Python version: 3.7
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2
- GPU models and configuration: Titan XP
